product1.name: Woven Jacket
product1.description: Crafted with stretchy, breathable material, the Nike Tech Woven Jacket offers you ease of movement and adjustable details. Bungee cords with cord locks create a custom fit at the hem and hood.

product2.name: Woven Oversized Pants
product2.description: Crafted with stretchy woven material, these Nike Tech pants offer you ease of movement and adjustability. The wide-leg cut is paired with bungee locks at the ankles that let you switch up the fit.

product3.name: Fair Isle Swoosh Sweater
product3.description: This Fair Isle sweater offers the notable qualities of the traditional version—warmth, comfort and a festive aesthetic. We updated this timeless style with a Swoosh logo knit into its wool jacquard fabric.

product4.name: Chamois Double-Knee Pants
product4.description: These loose fitting, straight leg pants take you from work to the weekend in crisp, clean style. They're made with supersoft heavyweight canvas, a durable material that stands up to whatever you throw at them.

product5.name: Padded Work Vest
product5.description: This loose fitting vest has your back through seasonal transitions and beyond. It's made from heavyweight cotton with a thick, old-school ribbed collar. Lightweight fill and a peached lining offer a soft interior finish.

product6.name: Carpenter Pants
product6.description: Designed for durability, these carpenter pants are made with heavyweight cotton twill that stands up to routine wear. Their relaxed fit and numerous pockets give them a classic, functional feel.

product7.name: Heavyweight Waffle Long-Sleeve Top
product7.description: Elevate your everyday base layer with this heavyweight waffle-knit thermal top. Designed to feel relaxed yet structured, it’s an essential addition to your cool-weather wardrobe as a layering piece or on its own.

product8.name: Therma-FIT Jacket
product8.description: Don't let the foul weather stop you with this ultra-warm and dry GORE-TEX coat. Spacious through the body and sleeves, it also has a full-length zipper and adjustable hem that let you dial in the perfect fit. The hood and breathable face shield add even more coverage.
